paragraphs.content: The Contractor accepts the Assignment and thereby assumes full responsibility for the proper performance of the agreed services.

The Contractor shall organize its work independently. However, where necessary for the execution of the **"Assignment"**, coordination with the Principal shall take place in the event of cooperation with others, in order to ensure that such cooperation proceeds optimally. If required for the proper performance of the Assignment, the Contractor shall align with the working hours applied by the Principal.
The Principal shall provide the Contractor with all authority and information necessary for the proper execution of the **"Assignment"**.

The Contractor shall perform the agreed services entirely independently, at its own discretion, and without any supervision or direction by the Principal. However, the Principal may issue instructions or directions regarding the desired result of the **"Assignment"**, within the meaning of Article 7:402 of the Dutch Civil Code.
The Contractor shall promote the best interests of the Company and its affiliated companies.
